subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Inform the planet!?

This is going to really sound weird to most folks, but both rich and poor  =

people should go back to living as it was at the turn of 1900, only keep t=
he 
 good things, like medicine, and start parking the cars and trucksfor 
=
awhile,  for at least twice a week, use the horse's again, for buggy or rid=
ing 
them  to work.  <g>  Stop the cutting of all wood for at least a year =
 or two, 
reuse some of the old stuff, stop using planes, unless in emergen=
cy,  and 
go back to using trains again, maybe just steam engine.  Keep the=
  
electricity, but, we should work on building more Solar panel's on homes=
,   wind 
turbines, and at least be granted big discounts by government to =
have these  
things installed in our homes.  People would lose some jobs, b=
ut they could  do 
similar without all the stress, Pilots could take on cro=
p dusting for a  
while, lol  forest and land developers could become growe=
rs, planters for  new 
trees.  Stop tearing out mountains for awhile, let t=
he trees take root,  so 
what if we must go the long way for awhile or thin=
gs take more time, there  
would be less land slides.  With less driving wo=
uld be less need for oil,  
less pumping, stop with the fishing for awhile =
too, over 90% of the oceans 
are  now being over harvested!  If we could st=
op eating so much of any one  
thing, things could improve, thing is, this =
whole world would need to see 
things  this way in order to save itself.  W=
e may not be getting as warm as we  
think, even worse we are more then lik=
ely going into an ice age if we are 
not  careful, and the world is becomin=
g off balance, or is shifting, and just 
melting  away without it's interna=
l support system.  I think your right, 
Frank.  sf

In a message dated 2/23/2011 12:26:11 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
purplea=
liengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
What happend to guy spouting all the new =
age-crystal skulls-spirit stuff?  
Is it decernment, or denial? When you lo=
ok at the weather, the earthquakes,  
the actions of humanity--getting dumb=
er and dumber by the day, the active  
debunking going on, the lack of news=
 coverage for comets--it begins to look  
like something is going on. I don=
't buy the Jesus stuff either, but that  
doesn't negate the facts.

As far=
 other planets in the solar system, I  think "science" has it all 
wrong, I=
 think most are habitable in some form. I  got voices saying they came 
fro=
m the sixth planet, presumably in this system,  and once again I have 
ask,=
 how would anyone else "know better"? I don't  believe constant and daily 
=
Earthquakes are the norm, or they wouldn't be  mentioned in the bible as a =

sign of the times. I think this planet is severely  fractured, and very li=
ttle 
holding it together. 
What happens when you  don't keep moving parts =
lubricated--as in pulling 
out all the natural oil of  the planet? I think =
we are living on a future 
asteroid belt as it ceases up  and flies apart. =
Yet again, how would anyone 
"know better"? With only a slight  amount of r=
esearch, anyone can punch holes in 
every "scientific" theory all  day long=
. Some dweeb in a university has a 
thought and it becomes gospel. Some  du=
ffus does a "thought experiment" and 
it's irrefutable--how the f--- does  =
that work!? You think it, therefore it 
is by virture of titles and degree?=
 If  you don't have titles and degrees, 
anything you think of is nonsensic=
al.  

yeah, rambling of a lunatickingnutcase.

F-S




--part1_c0f65.4fc0e197.3a96dbdb_boundary
